com.orbischallenge.game.engine2

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orbischallenge.game.engine2.Point

  • public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
    An immutable class representing an x and y coordinate pair. Created by Orbis Access (Canada) Ltd. on 09/06/2016.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Point() 
      Point(int x, int y) 
      Point(Point point) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Point add(Point point)
      Adds this point to the given one, and returns a new Point with the result.
      java.awt.Point asAWTPoint() 
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object o) 
      int getX() 
      int getY() 
      int hashCode() 
      static Point origin()
      Creates a new Point of 0, 0
      Point scale(int scalar)
      Multiplies the members of the given point by the given scalar, and returns a new Point with the results.
      Point signum()
      Returns the sign of this point's members Return value is new Point(sign(this.x), sign(this.y)) where sign of n < 0 => -1, n == 0 => 0, n > 0 => 1
      Point subtract(Point point)
      Subtracts the given point from this point, and returns a new Point with the results.
      java.lang.String toString()

      • signum

        public Point signum()
        Returns the sign of this point's members Return value is new Point(sign(this.x), sign(this.y)) where sign of n < 0 => -1, n == 0 => 0, n > 0 => 1

      • subtract

        Subtracts the given point from this point, and returns a new Point with the results.
